name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot with a unique twist. Equipped with soldier-style buttons and its arms and legs positioned in a hand-down stance, RetroBot is a charming and nostalgic creation. Its screen displays a cute cat, bringing a touch of whimsy to its mechanical design. RetroBot is a proud member of the WebtrES club, a community of technophiles and enthusiasts who appreciate the beauty of retro technology.
